reviewText: I love Scrubs... It's definitely one of my favourite shows! :D The person I bought them from, however, was a little untruthful about the state they were in.

This is a Christmas gift so haven't watched the discs. Opened Season one and everything seems to be working as supposed to. I will assume that the rest of the discs are good. Product came packaged and new as described. Shipping was quick. Am happy with this supplier.

I purchased this Season 1-7 set, and found that the first six seasons are legitimate, but the seventh season has been taped from the TV.  Very unprofessional, and I am assuming illegal.  I contacted the seller several times, with no response.
Having the opportunity to watch my all-time favorite TV show any time I want was well worth the money!

When i ordered i got all 8 seasons.  seasons 1-6 worked great but season 7 skipped a lot and had all the advertisements from NBC on it like i was watching it when it first aired. Also i could not shut off the captions.  However, overall it was a great buy.
I think this is one of the best series.  Certainly funny but also touching at times.

I bought recently the 7 seasons of scrubs and it's totally the money worth it. I love the show and you can't get it for a better price. The quality is amazing and I tell you, you gonna enjoy it.
If you are looking for the 7 seasons to get it cheap, take this offer!

see ya

I bought this item before reading reviews for all the other season 1-6 boxes.  Needless to say, most of those items seem to be fake deals for the people that don't buy directly from Amazon.  That said, I can say that if you but this through Amazon it is incredibly legitimate and each season comes in its own sealed box set exactly like if you were to buy them individually.  Each and every single DVD is authentic and works perfectly.  As far as being a deal, this is a great one.  It is cheaper then every other box set for season 1-6 and this one includes season 7.  It is also cheaper then all 7 seasons bought individually.  Great deal, please just make sure to buy directly from Amazon!
It took 26 days for this item to arrive from deals by Joe and I only received 6 seasons, not all 7
